abstract.p: IDG Books Worldwide, publishers of 'For Dummies' series, releases new series of eight travel books (S)

block.p: Travel is said to broaden the mind, which is good for the purchasers of a new series of vacation guides. IDG Books Worldwide, publishers of the ''For Dummies'' series of instructional books, has come out with eight travel books, with seven more due by the end of the year. Now available are Walt Disney World and Orlando for Dummies, Cruise Vacations for Dummies and New York, California, San Francisco, the Caribbean, Europe and London for you-know-who. Many of the hotel and restaurant listings come from Frommer's guidebooks, which IDG also publishes. The Dummies guides cost $15.99 to $19.99; (800) 434-3422.
